🔥"#Bitcoin is not about moving a $1 billion from here to Tokyo. 

It's about moving $1 billion from here to the year 2140"

All of the people who thought #Bitcoin was a ponzi scheme are getting silenced.😎

Don't wait, buy #Bitcoin now or  you will end up buying at $100k before the end of 2022🔥🚀
I pretty don't put my income in anything that is %100 safe from the start. If it doesn't involve risk taken, it can't make your successful. That is why choose crypto currencies. #Bitcoin
JUST IN🔥: Brazilian Senate announces imminent approval of the #Bitcoin law.🚀
NEW🔥: FIS, one of the leading global payment processing systems has partnered with Fireblocks to offer #Bitcoin and #crypto to its institutional investors.🚀🚀😎
NEW 🔥: 🇦🇷 The town of Sorradino in Argentina is planning to mine #Bitcoin to raise money to upgrade infrastructure.🚀
NEW 🔥: City of Miami-Dade recommended to accept #Bitcoin as payment by it's own 'Task Force'.🚀😎
NEW:🔥MASTERCARD had  just launched Europe's first #Bitcoin-backed card with a line of credit.🚀
